name: Kingline
description:
I ran out of time and was unable to change the key settings- use arrow keys instead of wasd, n instead of space, and m instead of e!!

You're a king. You're getting old, and the town wizard strengthens your soul so that it can take over another body whenever you die. When you take over another body, you claim that you are the king but no one believes you, telling you to go defeat the dragon to prove that you are the king.
